attributes.action: Reduce the Road Tax until Pot Holes have been filled
attributes.additional_details: The government is the only body that can help since you control both the Car Tax and the Highways agency who are totally incompetent at doing their job. I have fallen off my bike twice due to pot holes and luckily there was no traffic on the road.
attributes.background:
I would like the government to force the highways agency and councils to fix the tremendous amount of pot holes across the country
I would like to suggest a reduction or cancellation of all Road Tax until this is done

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which calls for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636418
Half road tax in areas where roads are not adequately maintained

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633626
Require daily council tax discounts by councils that fail to maintain roads

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634995
Increase funding for the repair and resurfacing of roads
